name: Weirdo Birdo
description:
Weirdo Birdo is an arcade-style game in which the player controls the bird Birdo, which moves persistently to the right. The player is tasked with navigating Birdo through pairs of obstacles that have equally sized gaps placed at random heights.

For make Birdo fly higher, you just have to click on the screen with your left button of the mouse.

Game made by robottoboy for the Game Off 2022, wich theme is cliché. In fact, I made my own version of one of the most famous arcade games of the last generations. All the things that you can find in the game (drawings, animations, code, etc...)  is made by me.
